title: 'Our Thing' Podcast S2 Episode 4: Nicky Cowboy
description: The critically acclaimed podcast returns for a second season. Directed by: James Carroll. For the next several episodes we rewind a bit and tell the stories of the final years before the hit on Paul. In this episode Sammy tells the story of one his crew members - Nicky Cowboy.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
